commits.msg: Initial commit of new configuration
Initial commit of puppet-cinder
cinder -> manila filename replace
cinder -> manila text replace
A few questions to review later
Removed backup service
volume -> share
Cosmetic changes and removed deprecated params
Removed share and backend drivers
Generic driver fixes
added support for configuring nova, neutron, cinder
add generic driver support
add rootwrap config lines
Remove nfs module
first pass at netapp driver support
Added ntap deps
delete irrelevant tests
edit tests for share drivers
bring files up to date with cinder master

edit the share testing .pp

not confirmed to work
Changed database_connection to sql_connection
change enabled_backends to enabled_share_backends
Cleaned up netapp driver
Cleaned up gluster driver
Cleaned up generic driver
manila volume types
Remove deprecated params, add new
rename database_ to sql_

Revert mysql back to 0.9

specifying 2.2 still loaded version 0.9, but would try to use the new
version's api. caused issues.
Added support for service instance
Drop support for MySQL 0.9 (2.2 only)
Fixed typo
Changed service_instance back to a class (oops)
Fixed auth.pp comments
Address #NTAP comments
aesthetic changes

Update README to indicate being on Stackforge

This change updates the reference to Stackforge and also fixes
capitalization of OpenStack in the README. It also fixes a few minor
issues that were failing check tests.

Change-Id: I3bc4fc8515c1b3d56d789f1bb199e2cd512e6dbe

Package for share service

Package for manila-share service is available also for RedHat derivatives
as can be seen at http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/buildinfo?buildID=581039

Change-Id: Iac260d9e00803be61ead607e44383af0e19b69f7

Re-factorise Keystone resources management

Re-factorise the code of Keystone resources management with backward
compatibility since we don't modify the unit tests.

Change-Id: I3ae63eff002d8a08007e797c46471b3e2ca21ef5
Implements: blueprint common-openstack-identity-resource

Migrate postgresql backend to use openstacklib::db::postgresql

Let migrate to the new openstacklib::db::postgresql helper for
postgresql backend. This commit also unpin postgresql fixture
(openstacklib support now the latest version of postgre module).

Change-Id: I632aa31dd664032b7d0bf7bed44a3c89f6981d10
Implements: blueprint commmon-openstack-database-resource

Makes kombu_ssl_* parameters optional when rabbit_use_ssl => true

The kombu_ssl_* parameters should not be required when rabbit_use_ssl => true
Rather, rabbit_use_ssl must be set to true if the kombu_ssl_* parameters are
used.

Closes-Bug: 1356083
Change-Id: I95689b19d6bd8b5e7499a89ff0890f688a3c08b3

Fix manila::service_instance type

Accord to the definition, manila::service_instance
should not be class type, it should be define type.

Change-Id: I28f216936d6b52efdcc179ebb7fc6775053fd33b

Switch to TLSv1 as SSLv3 is considered insecure and is disabled by default

Rabbitmq won't talk to us anymore if we try to use SSLv3 as it disabled
support for SSLv3. Openstack components use python's openssl
implementation which does not support TLSv1.1 and TLSv1.2 yet so we
just switch to TLSv1. Support for newer TLS should come with python
2.7.9+

Closes-Bug: #1409667
Change-Id: I0f044e2812dea305287120526af42d894b7e895c

Write share_helpers to config as CSV

Currently, the share_helpers parameter is implemented
in the manifest as a list, but the list is written
directly to the config file.  It needs to be written
as a comma-separated list instead.

Change-Id: Ic57c4e78567712397aff9550036f8feb772ad4d5

Remove enabled_share_backends param from NetApp backend

Instead of using this flag directly, the user should
use manila::backends to manage it.

Change-Id: Icc35d343c00b86d0182dc684e4306d5db7ac75a2

Change share server config details

Update the generic driver service instance
configuration details, such as allowing a user
to specify a Glance image to automatically import.

Change-Id: I86f748b770e34c0d0db46cca2c1c7e0d3edb5948

Add Puppet 4.x lint checks

- This changes the puppet-lint requirement to 1.1.x, so that we can use
  puppet-lint plugins. Most of these plugins are for 4.x compat, but some just
  catch common errors.

Change-Id: Ie7e1f8b4d4cdd5d058b95cdf2c29c80dc73b954c
Signed-off-by: Gael Chamoulaud <gchamoul@redhat.com>

Add puppet-lint-param-docs plugins to puppet-lint

- This puppet-lint plugin checks if all parameters are documented
- Fix all the undocumented parameters.

Change-Id: Id9a9d11a972f6db46ed047b0a1f223995193476a
Signed-off-by: Gael Chamoulaud <gchamoul@redhat.com>

Use versioncmp for '::operatingsystemmajrelease' comparison

Use the builtin versioncmp() function for comparisons of the
'::operatingsystemmajrelease' fact. If that fact evaluates to a string,
regular arithmetric comparisons will fail under the Puppet 4.x
language.

Change-Id: I9ef21e97413b3ef2a375a80fe32b072a47d37a22
Closes-bug: 1425300
Signed-off-by: Gael Chamoulaud <gchamoul@redhat.com>

Update share driver parameters

Updating share driver parameters to support upstream changes:
 - New NetApp driver options (single and multi-SVM)
 - Share servers in both NetApp and generic drivers

Change-Id: I1d4b4a9e82a7fa187b87a761a07bb5bf75f23951

Support network plugin model

Supports configuration parameters for the following new network
plugins:
 - Neutron (formerly the only option)
 - Neutron single network
 - Nova networking
 - Standalone network

Documentation for these plugins is in review here:
https://review.openstack.org/#/c/171166/

Change-Id: Ida57ae5551c962791eaddacb695996cf4e8dec23

MySQL: change default MySQL collate to utf8_general_ci

Install & configure MySQL database by using utf8_general_ci collation
which is the way documented in OpenStack [1] and already the default
in puppetlabs-mysql [2].

[1] http://goo.gl/GA5gyZ
[2] https://github.com/puppetlabs/puppetlabs-mysql/blob/master/manifests/db.pp#L7

Change-Id: Ia62e6acb4eab5539a6525e89d0a82081c16613f4
Closes-bug: #1446375

Add notification_driver and state_path option

This patch just add two frequently use options into manila::init.

Change-Id: I3c154c1cac66579b500628f1bbc013c32089839b
Closes-Bug: 1447880

Move rabbit/kombu settings to oslo_messaging_rabbit section

Kilo oslo-messaging deprecates rabbit/kombu settings in the
DEFAULT section.

Move these settings to proper oslo_messaging_rabbit section.

Change-Id: I0b61bacd19c3dbb7db5f27716c0aa2a1f1941d21
Closes-bug: 1444161
Signed-off-by: Gael Chamoulaud <gchamoul@redhat.com>

Introduce public_url, internal_url and admin_url

This change deprecates the following parameters:
- share_version (replaced by public/internal/admin_url)
- port (replaced by public/internal/admin_url)
- public_protocol (replaced by public_url)
- public_address (replaced by public_url)
- internal_protocol (replaced by internal_url)
- internal_address (replaced by internal_url)
- admin_protocol (replaced by admin_url)
- admin_address (replaced by admin_url)

Add deprecation warnings if any of those values are provided
while maintaining full backward compatibility.

Change-Id: Ie4e96f90f9c0d47b252666cae403bc7fab4f63b7
Closes-bug: #1274979

Move lock_path into oslo_concurrency section

[DEFAULT]/lock_path is deprecated, it has moved into [oslo_concurrency].

See more info:
  https://github.com/openstack/manila/blob/master/etc/manila/README.manila.conf

Change-Id: I1984d3b9b39ad5c66113fd19c3e5486e44f88780
Closes-Bug: 1447889

keystone/auth: make service description configurable

This commit adds the service description as a class parameter in order to allow
users to update from a previous version if the service description is changed
(incorrectly spelled or wrong description)

Change-Id: I86dcdb118a229cfdf7b0cde8010eb26b71a0ab32
Closes-Bug: #1468407

Add manila share manager parameters

This patch adds following parameters from manila.share.manager
to manila::backend::generic:
  - delete_share_server_with_last_share
  - unmanage_remove_access_rules
  - automatic_share_server_cleanup

Change-Id: Id9b06e107d4cc3848afad0a3ddecac7c616cbe0e

Add related parameters to manila::quota

This patch is aim to following params in manila::quota:
  - quota_snapshot_gigabytes
  - quota_share_networks
  - reservation_expire
  - until_refresh
  - max_age

Change-Id: Ic28c6115a7c07554c6d333e491a2f1dd252c9520
Closes-Bug: #1469583

Add options to enable Manila to run with NFS-Ganesha backend.

Change-Id: I44c3e49089fd8d5a1ee30ed84dc20944ba92461a

Move rabbit/amqp_durable_queues setting to oslo_messaging_rabbit section

Kilo oslo-messaging deprecates rabbit/amqp_durable_queues setting in the
DEFAULT section.

Move the setting to oslo_messaging_rabbit section.

Change-Id: I5a5d84e3bfa39126fe12feef03953e295e715850
Closes-Bug: #1472847

Move qpid settings to oslo_messaging_qpid section

Kilo oslo-messaging deprecates qpid settings in the
DEFAULT section.

Move these settings to proper oslo_messaging_qpid section.

Change-Id: I342f8e503884662139db8b8d245d14a88ca5fa96
Closes-Bug: #1472039

Add support to configure GlusterFS drivers with Manila shares.

Change-Id: Ief4f80d6dc9f49bd66a269c3560beac82a57081f

Add tag to package and service resources

In order to be able to take an action after all the packages of the
module have been installed/updated or all the services have been
started/restarted, we set a 'manila-package' and 'manila-service' tag
for each package and service of this module.

At the moment, there is a generic openstack tag that is not specific
enough if one wants to take action upon a single module change.

Use case :

If an action needs to be taken after all the packages have been
installed or updated : Package <| tag == 'manila-package' |> -> X

Change-Id: If5158088e38be1f86d81c5100f600a1fa9a24bac

Add related parameters to oslo_messaging_amqp section

This patch is aim to following params in manila class:
  - amqp_server_request_prefix
  - amqp_broadcast_prefix
  - amqp_group_request_prefix
  - amqp_container_name
  - amqp_idle_timeout
  - amqp_trace
  - amqp_allow_insecure_clients
  - amqp_ssl_ca_file
  - amqp_ssl_cert_file
  - amqp_ssl_key_file
  - amqp_ssl_key_password

Change-Id: I54fc972b793ba0b6bbbef2c5be19319aead65916
closes-Bug: #1476449

api: require ::keystone::python

Because we need Keystone up and running (with its resources) before
trying to start Manila API service, let's require ::keystone::python in
api.pp manifest.
This is how it's done in other modules (see Nova, Neutron, Swift,
Glance, Trove, Tuskar, Gnocchi and Ceilometer).

Change-Id: I1116a097aac3632397e2a05e799e9d7afa16f77d
Cloes-Bug: #1484620

Rely on autorequire for config resource ordering

Currently we specify the ordering of config resources wherever it is
necessary based on the presence of the file it will write to, or the
presence of the package in charge of providing the file it will write
to

Those kind of ordering can be specified directly at the resource level
using the autorequire mechanism. With this patch, any config resource
will make sure the package in charge of providing the file will be
installed first.

Change-Id: Id40b1ccb705699876da23f0f7324c369ecbc71a5

rabbitmq: do not manage rabbitmq service anymore

rabbitmq_class was deprecated in the previous release, this patch drop it.

That means:

  * we are not installing rabbitmq service anymore.
  * rabbitmq_class parameter is deleted
  * port, cluster_disk_nodes and enabled parameters are deprecated for
    backward compatibility but port and cluster_disk_nodes have no effect
    since we don't install rabbitmq anymore.
  * unit tests are updated

Change-Id: I01b1dcaeef55c2a5c07f7c2c4b0ad7433eceee7b
Co-Authored-By: Emilien Macchi <emilien@redhat.com>

Simplify rpc_backend parameter

It is no longer necessary to specify the whole python namespace
for the backends, and
http://docs.openstack.org/developer/oslo.messaging/opts.html lists
the short versions.

This patch maintains backwards compatibility with the previous
default value in case it is explicitly used.

Change-Id: Ie8f298c86266aec249071dc25ce2263c17e65a57

Put all the logging related parameters to the logging class

Currently logging configuration is splitted in two distinct classes,
the init.pp and the logging.pp classes. This review aims to centralize
all logging related parameters in a single class, the logging.pp one.

The impacted parameters are :

  * use_syslog
  * use_stderr
  * log_facility
  * verbose
  * debug
  * log_dir

This change remains backward compatible with what is currently in place.

Change-Id: Ibb75be575420d49f99c9841b957e2b12cdedea41

Introduce manila::db class

Current modules[1][2][3] implements a
<component>::db class that is not implemented in manila.

This commit aims to apply here the same logic.

[1] https://github.com/openstack/puppet-nova/blob/master/manifests/db.pp
[2] https://github.com/openstack/puppet-designate/blob/master/manifests/db.pp
[3] https://github.com/openstack/puppet-ceilometer/blob/master/manifests/db.pp

Change-Id: I803a5eacc7a81854e2bdd715785886c0f6cfbc33

db: Use postgresql lib class for psycopg package

This patch introduce the same design than mysql for postgresql
by requiring dedicated lib::python class instead of declaring
a new resource package within manila module.

Change-Id: I441f5ca6f9d5cbaa7705f5b72e48528dcff67f8d

Manila $::os_service_default for db and log

Switch to $::os_service_default all params in logging and db.
Changes: logging.pp, db.pp and tests.

Related-bug: #1515273

Change-Id: Idf7bc36d321328391a1b361add965c53627124a4

enable sharev2 API capacity

* With the same interface as puppet-nova and puppet-cinder, create *_v2
  parameters.
* Keep v1 enabled by default for backward compatibility.
* Enable v2 by default because that's the new API since Juno release.

Change-Id: I81a5c6696708732a0de34225200f1242e988d0aa
Closes-Bug: #1512577

Remove qpid messaging support

Qpid messaging driver is removed from Oslo.messaging [1]
Therefore, we cannot support it anymore.

[1] I4a9cba314c4a2f24307504fa7b5427424268b114

Change-Id: I65ccf6feeaad548c8f11660318c20499ef3602ac

Support of PyMySQL driver for MySQL backend

Add the ability to use python-pymysql library as backend for MySQL
connections.

Update acceptance tests to use pyMySQL.

Change-Id: Ia47aa99ade73ae63da0e00e32a4f87cefaaa9bda
Docs: https://wiki.openstack.org/wiki/PyMySQL_evaluation

Add rabbit_ha_queues option

There are two ways for setting up RabbitMQ HA:

 1. Configure rabbit_hosts to multi rabbit hosts.
 2. Setting up a loadbalancer in front of RabbitMQ cluster,
    provide a unique address in rabbit_host

In current, rabbit_ha_queues option is controled by rabbit_hosts if
conditional statement. But when users try to use the second method:
changing rabbit_ha_queues to true, but they don't use rabbit_hosts
option, then this logic will not work.

This patch adds an rabbit_ha_queues option, set it to undef by
default for forward compatbility.

Change-Id: Ie849085fbbd9e1478e28945ea213ac4eb7b4afdb
Close-Bug: #1485287

fix type definition on liberty

Closes-Bug: #1543437

Change-Id: If68bb0a9f0685449506c22ee067fd85ff02e1144

remove POSIX users, groups and file modes

Change-Id: I782c5e428f9234bd0fff6cb3af217f051944fd7f
Closes-Bug: #1458915

Fix typos

This patch fixes several typos.

TrivialFix

Change-Id: I924aac9c56e842bf447d28f45a9ac5bdcf8b870a

Deprecate managing of rabbitmq resources

We stopped to manage rabbitmq resources from openstack puppet
modules a long time ago, but manila module still contains
rabbitmq class for its managing. This patch deprecates it.

Change-Id: Ica717e76374359f8eb3a4e2f0c06fff48fd05b2d

Totally drop Qpid support

Qpid was removed in Mitaka from Oslo Messaging, so now we can
drop it in manifests.

Change-Id: I354d192f6ae16ade0f7b991541896e5819b8168c

Add support for db_max_retries param

The db_max_retries parameter regulates the number of reconnection
attempts performed after an error raised rather than at startup.

Change-Id: I62a8ae71d3f041020596f844ea93e06136e31448
Closes-Bug: 1579718

Switch manila to oslo

The messaging and logging options are configured
using puppet oslo module.

Additional changes:

* add dependencies and version of oslo package in
  metadata.json file
* add a release note for switching manila to use
  puppet oslo module
* update related unit test
* switch messaging parameters to os service default

Change-Id: I5e5141b3eb277ca7faf7cc26e15c8bc04fd31901

Remove useless parameters

Switch db related parameters to oslo, the pymysql_package_name
and sqlite_package_name parmaters are useless, so delete them.

Change-Id: I687fb9b9edcaec4e11518a5c96f76bb588a5ab41

Deprecate verbose option in logging

Option "verbose" from group "DEFAULT" is deprecated for removal.
The parameter has no effect.
-Deprecated verbose for logging and init
-Remove verbose in README Remove verbose from tests.

If this option is not set explicitly, there is no such warning.

Change-Id: I2e769bf5de97552dcd361d0c01011d39eee960d9

Add SASL and username oslo.messaging amqp parameters

This patch:
* use oslo::messaging::amqp resource
* add remaining amqp parameters
* update spec test
* add releast note

Change-Id: I6e3fb79e6c63b2c68e79ddefb169ba1341f765ff

Deprecate use_syslog

[DEFAULT/use_syslog] was deprecated in Mitaka [1]
deprecate use_syslog, add warning, remove reference tests

[1]
http://docs.openstack.org/mitaka/config-reference/tables/conf-changes/manila.html

Change-Id: I1aa1a8658c395a79bbb00071b18c3ff3c71e942c

Revert "Deprecate use_syslog"

This option is not deprecated and still actual.

This reverts commit b64b13cc7cc5b64b968952d856d711e4cb98c8a7.

Change-Id: If64b0e1fe22f636e12a9ff842e04af0001af8137

Add transport_url parameters for oslo.messaging

This commit adds the transport_url parameters for oslo.messaging. The
url is of the form:

  transport://user:pass@host1:port[,hostN:portN]/virtual_host

Where the transport scheme specifies the rpc or notification backend
as one of rabbit, amqp, zmq, etc. Oslo.messaging is deprecating the
host, port, and auth configuration options [1]. All drivers will get
these options via the transport_url.

This patch:
* use oslo::messaging::default resource
* use oslo::messaging::notifications resource
* add parameters for transport_url(s)
* update spec tests
* add feature release note

[1] https://review.openstack.org/#/c/317285/

Change-Id: I6f58a4da46a44ec20b256f08108b3b045f1c55ee

Remove deprecated keystone::auth options

Change-Id: I442a7f76e28baaaa44e4197afae0460df46a99e8

Add purge_config option

Add the option in order to facilitate management.
User can ensure that only the options they hoped
are configured.

Change-Id: Id7c8b169b8bbb41a85b202ed9e2e97da18a368d2

Provide default service_name for keystone endpoint

This change updates the manila::keystone::auth class to include a default
service_name of 'manila' so that if a user changes the auth_name, the
service is still created as being related to 'manila'.  This improves the
user experiance when they want to customize the usernames for services.

Change-Id: I8c6240473213b107de862edf359834b5494e9f74
Closes-Bug: #1590040

Include openstacklib defaults manifest.

This provides a mechanism for setting default across all modules.

Change-Id: Ib474afea23ccaf254f9aed54cb21d2c1a1442cf9
Related-Bug: 1599113

Don't always try to create the service image.

This patch makes it possible to create a service_instance resource
without also attempting to upload the image to glance.

This is required because the glance_image resource must be run on the
same host as the glance api service, meaning that it will fail when
trying to create a stand alone manila host.

Defaults to true in order to retain backwards compatibility.

Change-Id: Id863272652db2b01e8d86b94cfd417fa78f7ea1b

Fix share_helpers default value.

Manila commit 401c8d982e8b6a95f01784cf647a7ac16513d61a moved the share helpers
into a separate module and changed the name of the CIFSHelper. This
change set updates the defaults used by puppet to match the new helper
module names.

Change-Id: I66b73858512ee5aed416aae840946f26c4cdc223

Make enable_proxy_headers parsing configurable

This is needed if you deploy manila behind a TLS proxy.

Change-Id: I49b7abb370188bcadb4b1f2fc3e4c4011c8942ca
Depends-On: Id33a0f7eeb8ced77d09f9edd6b1d65697d8bcfe7

Make an automated db sync conditional.

As per other OpenStack puppet modules enable the user to disable the
automated db sync, separate from the choice whether to enable or disable
the api service.

Change-Id: Id3c9d2e1e48d3c515dab73c8eac220cfe826a880

Add authtoken class

Add authtoken class like we do in all other modules, to configure
[keystone_authtoken] section.

deprecations:
- manila::api::keystone_user is deprecated in favor of
manila::keystone::authtoken::username
- manila::api::keystone_tenant is deprecated in favor of
manila::keystone::authtoken::project_name
- manila::api::keystone_password is deprecated in favor of
manila::keystone::authtoken::password
- manila::api::keystone_auth_uri is deprecated in favor of
manila::keystone::authtoken::auth_uri
- manila::api::keystone_auth_admin_prefix is deprecated and will be removed
in a future release
- manila::api::keystone_auth_host is deprecated and will be removed
in a future release
- manila::api::keystone_auth_port is deprecated and will be removed
in a future release

Change-Id: I3b124eb1d8c5d4e21811d0ec11c2e92f4088a90c
Closes-Bug: #1604463

Add CephFSNative driver logic

Adds the manifest for CephFSNative driver.

Change-Id: Ie97b1eb5fbb96417310fbfeb83bca67a96a01881

Tag manilaclient package with 'openstack' to inherit openstacklib defaults

The openstacklib defaults provides an "allow_virtual" parameter in
order for Puppet to pick up virtual packages through yum.
The real package name is "python2-manilaclient" but since allow_virtual
is not enabled, installing python-manilaclient doesn't work through
puppet.

Change-Id: Ie86e00abbdc0b50433d6cd9fd90fc872af5ac768

Add more info for deprecated parameters documentation.

Some parameters where missing their equivalent for
manila::keystone::authtoken in the documentation section.

Remove verbose

Since we are in Ocata we should remove the
verbose option that was deprecated

Change-Id: Ib513949f7d6fd627cc3a128e845f1135e67db14f

Added retries for db_sync

If db sync fails, it is never retried leading to errors. So, this
patch adds retries for db_sync to avoid sync fails.

Change-Id: I64e011820591796168cafa4e0a93d5e2157ce445
Closes-Bug: #1628580

Fix documentation for log_dir parameter

Change-Id: Iefd3f0e0138ceb73e299bd55fb22ad2f4ab4caa2
Partial-Bug: #1600294

Manila hooks support

This code moves all deps to an external class so that Manila can be
installed with mechanisms besides packages (like venv or docker). This
also cleans-up the dependency tree by removing false or confusing
dependencies.

Change-Id: I053dbef10d51664d99e633abb714b3520a681e96

Remove old authtoken options

Since we are in ocata lets remove all old parameters in api
to configure the keystone_authtoken section

Change-Id: Ie6c09e8d31c93f9fe2df0dad010f768e2498d1a2

Deprecate rabbitmq connection parameters

The rabbitmq connection parameters have been deprecated in favor of the
transport_url setting.

Change-Id: I528e7db15803388f8799b6e188569354cf93fc8a
Related-Bug: #1625198

Fix common options position and remove unused parameters

Some parameters are common for both systems,
they could be moved out from 'case'.
Some parameters have not been used, so reomve them.

Change-Id: I100720a4dc6e6f8b9c8e2322fc58d7646e39b8d6

Fix the annotation

Change-Id: Id626dc7ed06b8b1492793805bfe034fdcf5bc981

Fix duplicate declaration between manila/tripleO

There is a outside case where a user may use triple-O to stand up a
control node that has manila, cinder, and an nfs server.  This causes
a duplicate declaration of Package[nfs-utils].

addresses bug: https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=1400557

Change-Id: Ie89331396285a181f21a4d55715fd522965bd142

Deprecate signing_dir option

The signing_dir is deprecated for removel because of PKI token format
is no longer supported.
Update warning message and release note.

This config option is needed for setting up default
share type. Note that setting this option does not
create the share type itself (this still has to be
done manually and will be addressed in a future patch).

Allow python-memcache install from authtoken class

The python-memcache package is required if using memcached. By
default the package is not installed and the define has it set to
false. This change allows managing the python-memcache package
install from the authtoken class.

Add cephfs class and deprecate cephfsnative class

Manila cephfsnative driver was renamed to cephfs driver and
supports both direct cephfs access or through ganesha-nfs server.
This patch deprecates the older cephfsnative class and adds
cephfs class which is compatible with current manila cephfs driver.

Change-Id: I55d918f409b316decb2cf65ec38cfa8fbc7d1248

Fix dependency references

With the deps migration, we left some of the dependency references in
place which was previously ignored by puppet unit tests. The latest
version of puppet now reports these as catalog failures so this change
removes the unnecessary Package and Service references since those are
already handled by manila::deps and fixes the invalid anchor reference
for the manila::type and manila::type_set resources.

Deprecate oslo.messaging rpc_backend option parameter

Oslo.messaging uses the transport_url to represent the rpc and
notification messaging driver to use and its full configuration. The
rpc_backend configuration option is deprecated for removal and
should not gate oslo.messaging driver configuration options.

This patch:
* deprecate rpc_backend
* remove conditional check
* update spec tests
* add release note

Change-Id: Ia8f531ebb4a33ae1a5f73e212d06be1e41a6ead5
Closes-Bug: #1708976

Add "host" parameter for manila.conf

This parameter "names" the node but can be an opaque identifier
that is not necessarily a host name, FQDN, or IP address.  The
same "host" may be used for multiple nodes in an HA cluster.

Accept empty strings for log_dir

logging to stdout/stderr, which is useful when running on containers.

Change-Id: Idbe00cc844f9d1d088d5b55c9c0cf76647de10ab

Configure *_domain_name to Default by default

Keystone v2.0 API was removed so we have no choice but configuring
user_domain_name and project_domain_name otherwise it fallbacks to
Keystone v2.0 and it fails. This patch sets the default value so we make
sure Keystone v3 will be used out of the box for our users.
